scripts.build-prod: echo This is a no-op. && echo Due to Rust dependencies, the generated files are already provided. && echo If you really want to rebuild from source use: && echo npm run build-prod-force
scripts.build-prod-force: npm run build-step:install-wasm-pack && npm run build-step:copy-css && npm run build-step:install-mzoon && npm run build-step:build-app && npm run build-step:replace-pkg-gitignore
scripts.build-step:copy-css: cpy ../../../css/main.css public/css/ && cpy ../../../css/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css public/css/bootstrap/dist/css/ && cpy ../../../css/bootstrap/dist/fonts/* public/css/bootstrap/dist/fonts/
scripts.build-step:install-mzoon: cargo install mzoon --git https://github.com/MoonZoon/MoonZoon --branch signals --root cargo_install_root --locked && cpy cargo_install_root/bin/mzoon* .
